channel.title: Help me with client background please
channel.description:
Ok so orignally the folder called BrokenXcache2 was seperated with the client and source, so i added the folder to the client folder. In that folder, BrokenXcache2, it has the sprites and i replaced the background.png sprite with my own, and tried compiling but nothing happened.. What else could i try? (Pics below show all the files and what i did.)
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/30/cap1m.png/][IMG]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/8024/cap1m.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/845/cap2z.png/][IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/6123/cap2z.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/508/cap3c.png/][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/4425/cap3c.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Help me with client background please
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

First of all you don’t compile caches… and make sure you make it like this save it into the sprites folder “Background.png” exactly like that I prefer to copy and paste that without the quotes.

Read full topic
